Directions: In a large bowl, combine potatoes and bacon. In another bowl, combine the remaining ingredients; add to potato mixture ad toss gently to coat. Transfer to a greased 4-1/2-qt. baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 325 degrees F for 50-60 minutes or until bubbly and lightly browned.
Ingredients: 5 pounds red potatoes, cooked and cubed
1 pound sliced bacon, cooked and crumbled
